scripts.test: testcafe --ports 8000,8001 --hostname localhost remote:1 test/ -a 'npm run serve' --app-init-delay 3000 --quarantine-mode
scripts.dev: testcafe --debug-on-fail --ports 8000,8001 --hostname localhost remote:1 test/ -a 'npm run serve' --app-init-delay 3000
scripts.debug: testcafe --debug-mode --debug-on-fail --ports 8000,8001 --hostname localhost remote:1 test/ -a 'npm run serve' --app-init-delay 3000
